sources.title: Farm Relief (1929)
sources.description: An impromptu speakeasy sets up on Krazy's farm, and in no time, all the animals are drunk, and Krazy himself is so soused that he attempts to milk (an apparently male) donkey. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/farm-relief-1929/

metadata.Plot: At Krazy's farm, he plays piano to spur his animals to produce, but a "Blind Pig" appears, producing an outdoor bar, and they all start guzzling booze, with wild results, like a horse drags a plow through the farm, leaving everything in halves, a lamb turns into a lion, a hen lays eggs with bottle shaped chicks. Even Krazy and his piano get drunk, and he mistakenly tries to milk a male donkey.( Off screen, thankfully.)
